articles.author: Michael Wayland
articles.title: General Motors raises 2024 guidance after big first-quarter earnings beat - CNBC
articles.description: GM's North American operations, driven by truck sales, were largely responsible for the company's first-quarter beat and guidance raise, the automaker said.
articles.content:
The GM logo is seen on the facade of the General Motors headquarters in Detroit on March 16, 2021.
DETROIT General Motors on Tuesday raised its 2024 guidance after beating Wall Street's top- and bot… [+4205 chars]
